DOC.brief_title: Effects Manipulative Therapy Pain Education Individuals With CLBP
DOC.detailed_description: The outcome subjective pain ( measure Numeric Pain Rating Scale ) , pressure pain threshold ( measure Algometer ) , disability ( measure Roland-Morris Disability Questionnaire ) , fear avoidance belief ( measure Fear Avoidance Beliefs Questionnaire ) , risk poor prognosis ( measure STarT Back Screening Tool ) , quality life ( measure Short Form-12v2 ) blood biomarkers ( measure ELISA ) . The data collect blinded assessor . Individuals eligibility go assess blind assessor determine eligible research . Then , inform objective study ask sign consent form . Afterward , sociodemographic data record . The data relate research outcomes collect blinded assessor baseline assessment , six week three month . Random Allocation Before treatment begin , one researcher involve recruit assessment allocate individual one group . Block randomization use ; go generate randomization.com , site create list randomization sequence , see physical therapist treat individual . Statistical Methods Sample size calculation The sample size calculation calculate A-priori test follow specification : Statistical test ANCOVA , effect size 0.25 , statistical power 80 % , alpha level 5 % . As result , study require sample size 64 per group 128 individual total . Analysis effect treatment Our research use intention-to-treat principle . The descriptive data score RMDQ , SBST , FABQ , SF-12v2 NPRS well pressure pain threshold mean value inflammatory biomarkers , intervention , tabbed Microsoft Excel 2010 . To see effect treatment go use statistical base intention-to-treat principle , statistical analysis use analysis data individual socio-demographics clinic characteristic , present mean standard deviation . To compare group , Shapiro-Wilk test apply test normality distribution data , depend distribution use ANOVA one-way parametric data Kruskal-Wallis test non-parametric data . To compare group pre-intervention period another ANOVA-one way another Kruskal-Wallis apply . Covariance analysis ( ANCOVA ) conduct assess effect treatment follow outcome : Scores obtain RMDQ , FABQ , SF-12v2 , SBST NPRS , pressure pain threshold blood biomarkers concentration , utilize post-treatment mean dependent variable , pre-treatment mean co-variables group fix factor . To relationships among variable must apply Pearson correlation coefficient parametric data Spearman correlation coefficient nonparametric data . To classify relationship use Munro 's classification , value 0.26 0.49 low , value 0.50 0.69 moderate , 0.70 0.89 high value , 0.90 1.0 consider high . For analysis use Statistical Package Social Sciences ( IBM SPSS version 20.0 , IBM Corp , Armonk , New York ) .
DOC.criteria: Chronic episode nonspecific LBP least six month Pain movement least one direction ( flexion , extension , side bend rotation trunk ) At least score 3 NPRS . 1 ) Previous history lumbar myelopathy , rheumatic disease , tumor , peripheral central neurological disorder 2 ) Historical trauma , fracture surgery lumbar region ; 3 ) Nerve root compression sign : important muscle weakness affect low limb , decrease abolish patellar calcaneus reflex decrease dermatome sensibility low limb .
